features_implemented.description: Interactive graphical timeline showing environment changes over time

components.name: View Toggle System
components.description: Added List/Timeline toggle buttons in history toolbar

components.name: Timeline Container
components.description: Created SVG-based timeline container with controls

components.name: Visual Indicators
components.description: Color-coded circular nodes for different action types (switch, rollback, edit, etc.)

components.name: Timeline Rendering
components.description: SVG-based timeline with chronological layout (oldest to newest)

components.name: Zoom & Pan Controls
components.description: Zoom in/out buttons, fit-to-screen, and zoom level display

components.name: Interactive Features
components.description: Click nodes for details, hover tooltips, connecting lines between events

components.name: Smart Minimap
components.description: Thumbnail overview with viewport indicator (shows when >5 entries)

components.name: Modern Styling
components.description: Glassmorphism design, smooth animations, responsive layout

components.name: Data Processing
components.description: Chronological sorting, time range calculation, workspace path handling

components.name: Webview Communication
components.description: Proper message passing between extension and webview

features_implemented.description: Extended existing history functionality with blame information

components.name: Blame Information
components.description: Added user, timestamp, and commit hash to diff data

components.name: Diff Enhancement
components.description: Extended EnvDiff interface to include blame information

components.name: History Recording
components.description: Modified history recording to include blame data

components.name: Blame Display
components.description: Added blame information display in history details

features_implemented.description: Fixed major issues preventing proper extension functionality

components.name: Timestamp Parsing Bug
components.description: Fixed TypeError in historyManager.ts when saving entries - timestamps weren't being parsed from JSON strings back to Date objects

components.name: Missing .env File Recording
components.description: Fixed issue where direct edits to .env file weren't being recorded in history - condition only matched .env.* files

components.name: Content Security Policy Violation
components.description: Fixed CSP errors preventing View/Diff/Rollback buttons from working - replaced inline onclick handlers with data attributes and event delegation

components.name: Filename Display Issues
components.description: Fixed history showing 'N/A' for filenames - added logic to derive proper filenames from environment names

features_implemented.description: Comprehensive filtering and search capabilities for environment history

components.name: HistoryFilters Utility Class
components.description: Created comprehensive filtering utilities with regex support, date ranges, and multi-criteria filtering

components.name: Date Range Filtering
components.description: Added date picker controls with presets (Today, Last 7 days, Last 30 days, etc.) and custom range selection

components.name: Advanced Search with Regex
components.description: Implemented regex-enabled search with scope options (all content, environments, variables, values) and real-time validation

components.name: User/Author Filtering
components.description: Added multi-select user filtering with git author detection and user statistics

components.name: Variable-Specific History
components.description: Created variable timeline view showing complete change history for individual environment variables

components.name: Enhanced HistoryManager
components.description: Extended HistoryManager with filtering methods, variable history queries, and filter options API

components.name: Advanced Filter UI Panel
components.description: Created collapsible filter panel with organized sections, real-time feedback, and responsive design

components.name: Filter Statistics & Feedback
components.description: Added real-time filter statistics showing 'X of Y entries' with applied filter summary

components.name: Filter Persistence
components.description: Implemented filter state management with clear/reset functionality and session persistence

components.name: Responsive Filter Design
components.description: Created mobile-friendly filter interface with adaptive layouts and touch-friendly controls

components.name: Filter Accessibility
components.description: Added proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support for filter controls

features_implemented.description: Enhanced user interface for better organization and usability

components.name: History Tree View
components.description: Added tree-like organization to history viewer with collapsible sections and better categorization

components.name: Tabbed Main Interface
components.description: Implemented tabbed interface for main panel with Overview, Environments, History, and Settings tabs

components.name: Smart Environment Categorization
components.description: Added intelligent grouping of environment files by type (local, development, staging, production)

components.name: Enhanced Search & Filtering
components.description: Improved search functionality with advanced filters for environment management

technical_details.architecture: VS Code Webview API with SVG-based rendering
technical_details.styling: Modern CSS with glassmorphism effects and smooth animations
technical_details.data_flow: Extension â†’ Webview via postMessage API
technical_details.accessibility: Keyboard navigation, screen reader support, high contrast

user_experience.navigation: Intuitive toggle between list and timeline views
user_experience.interaction: Click, hover, zoom, pan, and filter functionality
user_experience.visual_feedback: Loading states, tooltips, and status indicators
user_experience.usability: Clear visual hierarchy and intuitive controls

testing_completed: Timeline rendering with real history data
Responsive design on different screen sizes
known_limitations: Timeline requires VS Code restart to appear in sidebar
Minimap appears only when >5 history entries exist
Zoom limited to 10%-500% range for usability
